presentationTable.name: Base Facts
presentationTable.description: This folder contains all the base facts like Revenue, Quantity, Target, Headcount and so on. All the metrics in this folder have the aggregation type as Sum unless explicitly specified.

presentationColumns.name: 1- Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F0 Sales Base Measures.1- Revenue
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 2- Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F0 Sales Base Measures.2- Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Billed Quantity data. Sources from Units physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension

presentationColumns.name: 3- Discount Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F0 Sales Base Measures.3- Discount Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Discount Amount data. Sources from Discount Value physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension

presentationColumns.name: 4- Paid Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F0 Sales Base Measures.4- Paid Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Paid Amount data. Sources from Revenue column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Paid time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 7- Shipped Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F0 Sales Base Measures.7- Shipped Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Booked Amount data. Sources from Dollars column in FactsRev table joining to time using Booked time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions
